issue.title: Ad placeholders on azlyrics.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.48.9b1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.azlyrics.com/lyrics/elliegoulding/gunsandhorses.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

At the top of the page, there are two blank spots which have their requests blocked by EasyList. The one on the top is a normal ad placeholder, and the second placeholder is from some music element that leads you to another page.
They can both be hidden with these filters:
`azlyrics.com##.lboard-wrap`
`azlyrics.com##.ringtone`

There's also another one at the bottom of the lyrics, which I was able to remove with `azlyrics.com##.noprint:has([id*="cf_async_"])`
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![230956079-33d115e9-8bb6-40e1-b52a-bc388b775e97](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/89158249/231905820-e5b03517-f2a6-4f3f-becd-6b848e28af18.png)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-04-13 19-52-45](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/89158249/231906910-f1f2503a-4d3e-4cea-92a7-165a95e97cb8.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Other ad blocker

uBlock Origin v1.48.4

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ekstrabladet.dk/krimi/familien-takker-vi-er-lykkelige/9723547

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://ekstrabladet.dk/`

### Issue:
Missing videos, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted!

### Example:
`https://ekstrabladet.dk/krimi/familien-takker-vi-er-lykkelige/9723547`

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rule:
`ekstrabladet.dk,th-deg.de,netkom.de,danbolig.dk#$#div[id^="CybotCookiebotDialog"] { display: none!important; }`

### Possible fix:
```
- ekstrabladet.dk,th-deg.de,netkom.de,danbolig.dk#$#div[id^="CybotCookiebotDialog"] { display: none!important; }
+ th-deg.de,netkom.de,danbolig.dk#$#div[id^="CybotCookiebotDialog"] { display: none!important; }
```

### Temp fix:
`ekstrabladet.dk#@$#div[id^="CybotCookiebotDialog"] { display: none!important; }`

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**Easylist Cookie List** / **Fanboy's Annoyance List** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/15558/~~ _(FIXED)_
~~`cajamar.es,refinery29.com,ekstrabladet.dk,th-deg.de,netkom.de,dasinvestment.com###CybotCookiebotDialog`
`cajamar.es,refinery29.com,ekstrabladet.dk,th-deg.de,netkom.de,dasinvestment.com###CybotCookiebotDialogBodyUnderlay`~~

--

* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v112.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]

comment.body:
Wygląda na to, że to ten sam problem co tutaj - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/130320#issuecomment-1254579008 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/130320#issuecomment-1254586978 i powoduje go opcja `Self-destructing first-party cookies (0)`.
Polecam wyłączyć tę opcję (`Ustawienia -> Tryb ukryty -> Samoniszczące ciasteczka firm pierwszych`), bo może powodować problemy na wielu stronach, albo przynajmniej ustawić inną wartość niż `0`.
Podobnie jeśli chodzi o `Samoniszczące ciasteczka firm trzecich`.

issue.title: azlyrics.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.48.9b1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.azlyrics.com/lyrics/elliegoulding/gunsandhorses.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

At the top of the page, there are two blank spots which have their requests blocked by EasyList. The one on the top is a normal ad placeholder, and the second placeholder is from some music element that leads you to another page.
They can both be hidden with these filters:
`azlyrics.com##.lboard-wrap`
`azlyrics.com##.ringtone`

There's also another one at the bottom of the lyrics, which I was able to remove with `azlyrics.com##.noprint:has([id*="cf_async_"])`
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![230956079-33d115e9-8bb6-40e1-b52a-bc388b775e97](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/89158249/231905820-e5b03517-f2a6-4f3f-becd-6b848e28af18.png)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-04-13 19-52-45](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/89158249/231906910-f1f2503a-4d3e-4cea-92a7-165a95e97cb8.png)

</details>


### Privacy
